text: Ezɨ fomɨra Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir ifavarir maba, me Israelɨn gumazibar tongɨn iti. Ezɨ kamaghɨra ifavarir tisaba uaghan ian tongɨn ikiam. Egh me nɨmɨra ia gifar, Godɨn bizir taba ian sure damuam. Egh me mongɨva akar ifavaribar amutɨ, da ian tongɨn otivam, kar akar ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gasɨghasɨziba. Ekiam ua me inis, eghtɨ me uamategh akɨrim ragh, Ekiam gasaragham. Ezɨ me kamaghɨn damuva, eghtɨ zuamɨra God me gasɨghasɨgham.
